item.title: pyplot
item.author: vllbc
item.description: matplotlib.pyplot学习 绘图标记 import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy as np ypoints = np.array([1,3,4,5,8,9,6,1,3,4,5,2,4]) plt.plot(ypoints, marker = 'o') # "o"代表实心圆 plt.show() maker可用的符号如下
